summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twentieth Avenue Northwest, in the City of Seattle, from Shilshole Avenue to Ballard Avenue, by planking the same and by constructing wooden walks, curbs and gutters, in accordance with Resolution No. 2047 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
